title: Kylie Jenner poses nude as she snuggles her duvet in bed snaps amid claims she's living with Travis
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kylie Jenner often peppers her Instagram with racy snaps.

And the make-up mogul treated her fans to a late night treat when she shared a series of nude photographs on Instagram on Friday.

It comes amid claims she's still living with her ex-partner Travis as they co-parent their daughter Stormi together.

Sleeping in nothing but perfume, the Kardashian barely covered her cleavage with the duvet while she posed up a storm in bed.

The cosmetic guru run her hands through her enviable long raven-coloured mane.

Kylie showed off her glowing complexion as she only topped up her features with a natural make-up palette.

(Image: Instagram)

It comes amid claims Kylie and Travis are reportedly back living together following their recent split.

They had been flirting up a storm on Instagram over a video of their young daughter.

The parents of one-year-old Stormi have been spending time together again as Travis, 28, moved back into Kylie's home in Calabasas.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The rapper dislocated his knee after falling on stage, and Kylie, 22, is allegedly helping him to recover.

A source told TMZ that when Travis isn't at that house, he's at the house they shared together in Beverly Hills.

The source added that the pair are maintaining a friendship as they co parent their daughter, and will be spending even more time together as the festive season begins.

Kylie and Travis recently took Stormi on an adorable day out to a pumpkin patch, although they took separate photos with the tot and none with each others.

The source also told TMZ they intend to celebrate Thanksgiving and Christmas together as a family, and to keep the whole family united at other events and parties.

They also revealed Kylie and Travis' friends think they will get back together by the end of the year.
description: Kylie shared another montage of raunchy snaps when she posed naked in bed amid claims she's still living with Travis
